sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react' import NewPostInput from './NewPostInput' const NewPost = () => { const [ myValue, setMyValue ] = useState({ author: '', content: '', date: '', title: '', }) const onChange = (e) => { let data = myValue console.log(data) data[e.target.name] = e.target.value setMyValue(data) console.log(myValue) } return(
author: {myValue.author}
content: {myValue.content}
date: {myValue.date}
title: {myValue.title}
) } export default NewPost
